dashboard.description: Metrics for Windows devices reporting to InfluxDB

panels.title: Overview - Uptime, Disk Space, Network Traffic

targets.query: SELECT 100-"Percent_Free_Space" AS "Free Percent" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance", "objectname"
SELECT mean("Packets_Received_persec") AS "Packets Received persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Packets_Sent_persec") *-1 AS "Packets Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") *-1 AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("Percent_Processor_Time") FROM "win_cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT 100-"Percent_Free_Space" AS "Free Percent" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance", "objectname"
SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") *-1 AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT 100-"Percent_Free_Space" AS "Free Percent" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance", "objectname"
SELECT 100-"Percent_Free_Space" AS "Free Percent" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "instance", "objectname"

SELECT mean("Available_Bytes") AS "Available Bytes", mean("Pool_Nonpaged_Bytes") AS "Pool Nonpaged Bytes", mean("Pool_Paged_Bytes") AS "Pool Paged Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("Standby_Cache_Core_Bytes") AS "Standby Cache Core Bytes", mean("Standby_Cache_Reserve_Bytes") AS "Standby Cache Reserve Bytes", mean("Standby_Cache_Normal_Priority_Bytes") AS "Standby_Cache Normal Priority Bytes" FROM "win_mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT mean("Cache_Faults_persec") AS "Cache Faults persec", mean("Demand_Zero_Faults_persec") AS "Demand Zero Faults persec", mean("Page_Faults_persec") AS "Page Faults persec", mean("Pages_persec") AS "Pages persec", mean("Transition_Faults_persec") AS "Transition Faults persec" FROM "win_mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Received_persec") AS "Bytes Received persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Bytes_Sent_persec") *-1 AS "Bytes Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Packets_Received_persec") AS "Packets Received persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Packets_Sent_persec") *-1 AS "Packets Sent persec" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)

SELECT mean("Packets_Received_Discarded") AS "Packets Received Disacarded", mean("Packets_Received_Errors") AS "Packets Received Errors" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)

SELECT mean("Packets_Outbound_Discarded") *-1 AS "Packets Sent Discarded", mean("Packets_Outbound_Errors") *-1 AS "Packets Sent Errors" FROM "win_net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("Percent_Disk_Read_Time") AS "Read Time percent" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(null)
SELECT last("Percent_Disk_Write_Time") *-1 AS "Write Time percent" FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instance", "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Current_Disk_Queue_Length") FROM "win_disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Context_Switches_persec") AS "Context Switches persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("System_Calls_persec") AS "Context Switches persec" FROM "win_system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname_influx
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_system" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Network Interface
list.name: network_influx
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "win_net" WITH KEY = "instance" WHERE host =~ /$hostname/

dashboard.title: Windows (WIP)
